mapper.select: select B.cgcategory1,A.brnum,A.brsubject,A.brmainphoto,A.brprice from board A,category B where A.cgnum=B.cgnum order by A.brnum desc
select C.mbnickName,C.mbpic,B.cgcategory1,A.brnum,A.brsubject,A.brmainphoto,A.brprice,A.brcount from board A,category B,member C where A.cgnum=B.cgnum and A.mbid=C.mbid order by A.brcount desc
select brnum,mbid,cgnum,brsubject, brmainphoto,brmorephoto,brcontent,broptions,brprice,brdate from board where brnum=#{brnum}
mapper.update: update board set brcount = brcount + 1 where brnum=#{brnum}
mapper.select: select cgcategory1,cgcategory2 from category where cgnum=#{cgnum}
select brnum,brsubject,brmainphoto,brprice from board where cgnum=#{cgnum} order by brdate desc
select brMainPhoto from board where brnum = #{brNum}

select C.cgcategory1,B.mbnickName,B.mbpic,A.brnum,A.mbid,A.cgnum,A.brsubject, A.brmainphoto,A.brmorephoto,A.brcontent,A.broptions,A.brprice,A.brdate from board A, member B, category C where A.mbid=B.mbid and A.cgnum>=#{start} and A.cgnum<=#{end} and A.cgnum=C.cgnum order by A.${column} ${order}

select C.cgcategory1,B.mbnickName,B.mbpic,A.brnum,A.mbid,A.cgnum,A.brsubject, A.brmainphoto,A.brmorephoto,A.brcontent,A.broptions,A.brprice,A.brdate,A.brcount from board A, member B, category C where A.mbid=B.mbid and A.cgnum>=#{start} and A.cgnum<=#{end} and A.cgnum=C.cgnum order by A.brnum desc
select cgnum,cgcategory1,cgcategory2 from category where cgnum>=#{start} and cgnum<=#{end}

select C.cgcategory1,B.mbnickName,B.mbpic,A.brnum,A.mbid,A.cgnum,A.brsubject, A.brmainphoto,A.brmorephoto,A.brcontent,A.broptions,A.brprice,A.brdate from board A, member B, category C where A.mbid=B.mbid and A.cgnum>=1 and A.cgnum<=109 and A.cgnum=C.cgnum and (A.brsubject like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' or B.mbnickName like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%') order by A.brnum desc
